breakthroughPP.board

Class BoardStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakthroughPP.board.BoardStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Viewer

    public class BoardStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Viewer
    This class provides restriced access to different fields and methods of the board. It works as a filter Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016 Gr CodeSalat
    Author:
    Fabiola Buschendorf
